column6:
***NEW A/C unit installed 6/25/17***

Cute self-contained Casita with beautiful Woodlawn Lake a 5 minute walk away, where you can relax, walk, jog or cycle. Great, easy access to Downtown and the Riverwalk. 

Just a 10 min drive to the famous Pearl Brewery area with all of its bars and restaurants. 

Good for couples, solo adventurers & business travelers.
